text: addehattinu nam is'hakhineyum ya'akhubineyum sam'maniccu. avareyeakke nam nervaliyilakki. atinumump nuhinu nam satyamargam kaniccukeatuttirunnu. addehattinre santanannalilppetta davudineyum sulaimaneyum ayyubineyum yusuphineyum musayeyum haruneyum nam nervaliyilakki. avvidham nam salkkarmikalkk pratiphalam nalkunnu
